title: Calories in Glazed Krispy Kreme
meta_description: Discover calories in glazed Krispy Kreme doughnut, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your diet tracking.
assumptions: Original Glazed Krispy Kreme doughnut, standard size (~52 g), fresh from the store, no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, recipe changes, and serving size. Check Krispy Kreme's official site or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Original Glazed Krispy Kreme doughnut contains 190 kcal and 22 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one glazed Krispy Kreme?
faqs.a: Approximately 190 kcal per Original Glazed doughnut.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a glazed Krispy Kreme?
faqs.a: About 22 g total carbs, including 10 g sugars and 0.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is there cholesterol in Krispy Kreme glazed doughnuts?
faqs.a: No cholesterol (0 mg) in the Original Glazed variety.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a glazed Krispy Kreme?
faqs.a: 11 g total fat, with 5 g saturated fat per doughnut.

faqs.q: Do calories vary for different Krispy Kreme glazes?
faqs.a: Yes; filled or topped versions can add 50â€“100 kcal or more.
